hadiths.text: This hadith has been narrated on the authority of Muhammad b. Sa'd through another chain of transmitters (and the words are):" The Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) struck between my neck and shoulder with his hand and said: Do you wrangle, O Sa'd, because I bestow (some gifts) upon a person?

chapter.ara-name: باب إِعْطَاءِ مَنْ يُخَافُ عَلَى إِيمَانِهِ
chapter.eng-name: Giving to one whose faith one fears
